snippet.title: Aerostrike Official itch Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Welcome aboard, Pilot #8. Take control of the Aerostrike and fight your way back home. Large dogfights await you in the depths of this underground complex.

Aerostrike is a combination of Metroidvania, Shoot-em-up, and Bullet Hell. Explore a large world and fight against entire squadrons of hostile ships. Collect various equipment and upgrades to let you push further and survive tougher fights.

Aerostrike is available for purchase at: https://lmg3864.itch.io/aerostrike
